PET  SUPPLIES SHIPPING SERVICES
                                        INFORMATION ON YOUR TRAILER IN TRANSIT.
                                              ALICE SPRINGS BRANCH ,AUSTRALIA     

Hello Mrs, Gerty Dogbreeder
 419 Kennel Road, Scruffs
 W.A..6660
                we wish to inform you  we have a 6 berth dog trailer from Mr frank jeff here at  AU Pet Courier Alice springs Branch, to be transported to you  with address in Perth(Still awaited).This tailer has come with all necessary papers needed including the inc identification  number ISO 10586  recorded on the Rabies Immunization certificates , But  the Alice Springs pet accessories/supplies checked up union had to conduct another test to be sure of  it's condition.This was done,and all was fine and Reg PAPERS where all  accurate, the test has been conducted and the trailer is  free from such technecial problems.So the trailer is now ready for shipment.The experienced pet supplies moving specialists at Land Animal Pet supplies Movers .. the IATA land cargo agency ... will handle your dog trailer move with confidence, professionalism, and trust. land  Animal's supplies NO TRANQUILIZER rule is designed for the safety and welfare of your pet supplies during landline air cargo transport.Land Animal Pet supplies Movers .. registered with the AUDA as an Intermediate Handler ...is governed by the rules, regulations, and mandates of the Animal supplies/accessories Welfare Act .. the AWA .. the Federal Law governing scheduled landline  cargo shipments. Ths shipping fees of $500 has been paid,But it should be noted that this shipment can not be carried out unless the ($3000) for the cost of the tailer,shipping fees inclusive is paid.An extra ($50)  if you want the puppy to be home delivered to another destination.This payment is to be  done to the Animal's  accessories/pet supplies developed 2nd party pet moving service to the moving & relocation industry  in  the United kindgom .So we will need you to pay this money in 3 installments of $1000 each as  soon as possible.This is inconfirmity with the Australian Maximum range Money account transfers abroad regulations, So as to confirm the next schedule which will be taking off to your delivery address this wednesday afternoon and thus delivered to your home with address in Perth, by two of our pet supplies carriers. YOU ARE REQUESTED TO PAY THE TOTAL FUND VIA WALMART,MONEYGRAM OR POST OFFICE MONEYGRAM SERVICE  BECAUSE WE HAVE THEIR UNITS AT OUR HEAD QUARTERS DESIGNED FOR SUCH TRANSACTIONS, TO THE DIRECTOR OF AU PET COURIER SHIPPING SERVICES LONDON USING THE ADDRESS;

NAME :BURCE MARTIN FON
COUNTRY:UNITED KINGDOM
CITY:LONDON
COUNTRY CODE:W1F 7BR
TEL:+44 7045742587


NB:For security reasons when you get to the MONEY GRAM  SERVICE THE POST OFFICE, they will ask you to provide  a  test question and answer, make it to be;
 
QUESTION: WHERE WILL IT GO TO
ANSWER:PERTH
 
So payment should be made as soon as possible,So as to Ship the puppy early enough. If this fee is not Provided, the TRAILER will not be dispatched from the detention of the  company and will spend more for the daily CHARGES until the Director confirms the payment of the $3000. So E-mail Us immediately  the  payment is made with full money transfer details including the various REFERENCE NUMBERS of 8 DIGITS AND  SENDERS FULL NAMES.land Animal's supplies Overnight Express will charge  the 'chip ... $0.00 + shipping and handling.Land Animal Pet supplies Movers is an endorsed and appointed IATA   ..... land cargo agency, providing both domestic Australian and global worldwide pet supplies moving services through IATA's member passenger airlines and their land cargo services.
                                                                         
 IMMEDIATELY  YOU  MAKE  YOUR  PAYMENT  AND THE PAYMENT  IS  PROCESSED ,THE TRACKING NUMBER OF THE TRAILER WILL BE GIVEN TO YOU.
                                                
                           STAY TO ENJOY THE SERVICE OF PET ACCESSORIES SHIPPING MOVING SERVICE
                                                       ALICE SPRINGS- BRANCH.

                                                        SECRETARY
                         SECRETARY
                                                       Mrs. Chris Gold                                              
 
                                               "The Move's Not Complete
                                                 ''Until the Pet ACCESSORY Arrives"

Hello Pet Carrier,
 
I regret to inform you that Gerty has had to leave suddenly for a family emergency.  Unfortunately her sister has a jammed heart.  I, Lou Adams, a friend of hers will be handling the payment and delivery of the dog trailer from Mr. Jeff.  Since your phone lines are down at this time, can you please email me details for the deposit with Moneygram please or other instructions for the deposit please.
 
Happy Days, Lou Adams

messages.body:
Dear Mr. Jeff,
I am Lou Adams, a friend of Gerty who is buying your dog trailer.  Unfortunately she has had to leave suddenly to be with her sister who has had a problem with her heart.  I will try to complete the transaction for her so that we can complete the deal without too much trouble for you.  Since you are in Alice Springs, I can get my brother to come and pay you cash for the trailer.  My brother Tim works in Alice Springs.  If you can give me your address I can have him deliver the money for both the trailer and the shipping to Perth.  Or you can give me your phone number and he can phone you about the arrangements for delivery.
 
Happy Days, Lou Adams





No salutations what so ever--he must be a busy man.  The 'Surprise Package' now comes into it.

Just follow these instructions.There are no account numbers to be used since these are transactions less than $10000.00
Go to any moneygram office,take a sender's form, fill it,then address all the payments(shipping fees inclusive) in a series of 3 or 4  installements to the address given to you.
You shall be requested a test question and answer.Let your test question be where do you live?and let the answer be Perth.Once completed,get back to us asap with the various series of 8digits confirmation numbers,and the sender's full names.Cameroon is our Sub Regional Office for Australia,Asia and Africa.it's known at moneygram,so you got nothing to be worried about it's location.You just got  less than an hour to confirm your payments and departure time,so you need to be fast.
The puppy is meant to be a Surprise from Mr jeff.

Dear Pet Carrier,
Ok I see.  I have to go to the office of the momeygram people.  I am very old and do not drive very fast and it will take me at least 6 hours to drive to the office.  I will not make it before they close.  We will just have to pay the extra day of $50 to store the trailer.  What about the puppy?  Where will he stay for the extra night?
 
I have offered Mr. Jeff that my brother works in Alice Spring and will be able to deliver cash to you or him if you give me the address.  That might be a quicker way?  Tell me what you think.  He could also take delivery of the puppy so he does not be hungry tonight.
 
Happy Trails, Lou

Happy trails, Lou

messages.body:
Dear Pet Carrier,
 
I have just got back from town where I visited my bank.  Unfortunately they do not offer me on line banking facility because they are an old fashioned bank.  But  because they have a sub branch in Alice Springs they have made the funds available there and they can be either picked up by your agent from the branch, delivered to you by one of their workers or my brother can deliver the money to you in person.  Your agent will need to identify himself to the sub branch and he will be given cash.  Otherwise just give me your address and I will have my brother drop by with cash.  This will be the fastest way.  Sorry for the trouble.
 
Please tell me how long the delivery will take after you have the funds?
 
Happy Trails, Lou

messages.body:
Dear Pet Courier,
 
I need to ask you to clarify something for me, being quite unequivocally and elder and also unjustly accused of being off my rocker at times, just before sending the funds.  The RTA of NSW & Qld TD and the AUST DPI within the rights of the QMRAS tells me that the registration of the trailer is not in the name of Jeff Frank nor is it in the name of the Au Pet Courier?   Do you hold vital consumption on said trailer, and are you able to transfer deed of sale, to new owner, on the behalf of some other unencumbered previous owner?  It's very important that you are able to answer this question, before my bank will release funds to Western Union tomorrow.  I have this money for my friend, and I am very anxious to complete sale and get the trailer dispatched to Perth as soon as possible.  I plan to leave at dawn's crack, so please be prompt.
 
Happy Trails, Lou Adams  (Louisa Mortadella)  I was a Mortadella before I married an Adams, then I shortened Louisa to Lou---hope you like it.




vital consumption?  Who knows!



Is this actually some sort of 'kindness' they are showing the old girl now?

messages.body:
Dear Mrs Lou,
You have nothing to be worried about.The trailer has all it papers,and will come along with them.Yes, we do hold vital consumption on the trailer.The transfer of deeds of sale to new owner isn't any problem because once the payments are done and confirmed,the trailer will be dispatched the her new owner's name.We belief they are of bad faith,making such allegations.They are just trying to unjustly accuse you,and make you beleive you are out of your senses.
Mrs Lou,just be firm with your decision tomorrow,and have the money transfered.Don't let people take advantage of your illness to make you beleive you are not reasonfull or make false allegations about you.Be rest assured that the trailer is duely registered and is ready to be dispatched to Perth as soon as the payments are receive at our Sub regional office.
  For this reason,we will simplify the payment procedues for you.As for tomorrow ,your total billing will be $3700.You shall simply make 3 payments of $950 each and a 4 payment of $850 to western union.This will sum up to $3700.Once completed,get back to us with the payment details and various 10digits confirmation numbers.We shall advise you to send us payments details while in town,so that in case of any problems,corrections should be made immediately.
 It has always been our constant pleasure helping you.Just be firm with your decision tomorrow when transfering the money, so that your bank shouldn't take advantage over your health situation to make wrong allegations about you.We believe you equally deserves all the respect and attention since you have always proven to be very reasonable with us.
We wish you the best for tomorrow,hoping to hear from you as soon as the payments are done.
Thanks,
Customer service
Au pet Courier
messages.raw:
Au Pet Courier
Dear Mrs Lou,
You have nothing to be worried about.The trailer has all it papers,and will come along with them.Yes, we do hold vital consumption on the trailer.The transfer of deeds of sale to new owner isn't any problem because once the payments are done and confirmed,the trailer will be dispatched the her new owner's name.We belief they are of bad faith,making such allegations.They are just trying to unjustly accuse you,and make you beleive you are out of your senses.
Mrs Lou,just be firm with your decision tomorrow,and have the money transfered.Don't let people take advantage of your illness to make you beleive you are not reasonfull or make false allegations about you.Be rest assured that the trailer is duely registered and is ready to be dispatched to Perth as soon as the payments are receive at our Sub regional office.
For this reason,we will simplify the payment procedues for you.As for tomorrow ,your total billing will be $3700.You shall simply make 3 payments of $950 each and a 4 payment of $850 to western union.This will sum up to $3700.Once completed,get back to us with the payment details and various 10digits confirmation numbers.We shall advise you to send us payments details while in town,so that in case of any problems,corrections should be made immediately.
It has always been our constant pleasure helping you.Just be firm with your decision tomorrow when transfering the money, so that your bank shouldn't take advantage over your health situation to make wrong allegations about you.We believe you equally deserves all the respect and attention since you have always proven to be very reasonable with us.
We wish you the best for tomorrow,hoping to hear from you as soon as the payments are done.
Thanks,
Customer service
Au pet Courier

messages.body:
Dear Customer,
Incase of any further resistance from your bank,get back to us while in town.We duely hope you find out a solution and settle out all your differences with your bank asap and have the money transfered,so that the trailer can be registered for delivery immediately.Further delays will be disadvantageous to you.
Thanks

Customer service.

messages.body:
Dear Sir,
 
This is Christina, Louisa's sister.  I have only just arrived home from going to town with my sister.  Yesterday on our way to the Western Union office we stopped for lunch and bought some egg sandwiches and I had the beef sandwiches.  The egg sandwiches had gone off and my sister Louisa has eaten them and they made her very sick.  By the time we reached town, she was vomiting and having stomach cramps so bad I found the nearest hospital for her. 
 
They admitted her and the lab technician found the egg sandwich to contain a very bad bacterial contaminant, Salmonella.  Louisa is gravely ill with this Salmonella.  Because of her age, they say it will be very hard on her.  She may even die from it as she is still unconscious.  I am very upset. 
 
I don't know how to go about completing the transaction on the trailer for her.  I can only hope she recovers in a couple of days and I will be able to drive back to town and pick her up and she will be well enough to make the deposit then. 
 
Don't worry if you have to ad more storage fees on the trailer to hold it for them, as Gerty left over $10,000 with Louisa for the trailer and anything else that might be needed while she was away.
 
Louisa was going to ask you what breed of puppy is coming because she wants to buy the right size bed for him before he arrives.  Please let me know so I can tell her.
 
Louisa would be sorry to think she caused you any incontinence, I am sure.  I apologise for her.  I pray for her recovery because the ground is so hard from the drought, we will need dynamite to dig her grave.  I have never used dynamite but I guess old dogs do learn new tricks.  I only pray I do not have to learn new tricks.
 
God bless all of us. 
 
Thank you, Christina

messages.body:
Dear Christina,
On behalf of our services,please extend our condolenses to Mrs Louisa.We do regret what is happening to her,and do hope she recovers promptly.As per your request,we shall keep the trailer for sometime.As for tomorrow the total billing will be $3800.
Please advise us if you will like to complete the deposite on her behalf,so that we could simply give you the procedure and directives since it's very easy.This will enable you from spending more money.As for the puppy,it's an English bulldog breed.Please,this was meant to be  a surprise,so don't let many people know about it because it might seize to be one when it finally arrives.
Thanks




Now Christina has hit the bottle.

messages.body:
Dear Au Pet Courier, thank God you're here.
 
It is with great relief of the puffer value, that I received your letter just now, as I have been inside myself, outside myself and beside myself with worry over Louisa, my dear little sister.  God bless her.  I pray Rove can bless her too.
 
Just minutes ago, the hospital phoned, to tell me there has been no change to Louisa, but also to say that this is rather good for her, at least she has not gone dead.  Small things sometimes happen to good people and other times, and sometimes good things happen to small people and to other people if they have the faith of Rove Live.
 
Thank you so very much for sending your condolences, that means so much to me, since I'm left here on my own to look after my sister, who is looking after the 'things' for a friend, who has gone to look after her sister, who has had a heart attack.  Quite frankly, I'm a bit pissed off, as they have left me in this big house, with lots of cash, but it's so far from freaking anywhere, I can't even get a bottle of scotch delivered within 6 hours, gladly that was solved.  I now have amplitty of bottles of Scotch--anality variety, and some Irish whiskers, of the viginal varity.
 
Oh, Oh an English Bulldog would please Louisa's friend Gerty, to the nines of time in the time square in London many times over.  I promise I will not tell.   I'm very good at keeping secrets, I only ever tell one person at a time.  Bob will get everything set up at Homer to make the little boy bulldog happy.  We can't wait for his arrival.  I'm jumping up and down, and nearly peeing meself over the thought.  Of course, a lot of that has to do with my age.  An old person should be able to be happy without peeing their pants, but God does not give us the good bladders.  She gives them to the young persons.
 
I know I'm asking things difficult for you now, but British Bulldogs, having stipulated veterinary regulations, for import and sale to within Austraile, do need X rey certification, and any dogs bred within Australia, need same MRI films and Zactitulated X rays because the breed seems to enjoy the company of the much maligned ferret, much to breeders disgust, but they just can't seem to resist cuddling and snoozling the ferret.  It might be a problem for the breeders but not for us, we are so happy to be getting a Bulldog.  So, is the puppy coming with Zactiulated X ray films???   Please let me know as any puppy being subjected to the
Zactiulated X ray films is also being subjected to the Australian Brain Worm, by accident.  I know the X rays are expensive, so please permit me to pay for them.
The worm transposes  zionsepticaly within the X raY and can cause shooting poos in the new puppy and usually, the poo happens before the diagnoses.  If we know now, we can be ready for it.  Nobody loves shooting poos.
 
Since we have enough shitting things on this farm, we do not need a new dog that also shits.  So, does your information state that the new puppy and the trailer will not have shooting poos due to the brain worm?  We would hate to think that the trailer could possibly be infested with the worm, oh mamma mia, should sucha thing happen.
 
I'm doing the best I can, I'm not a business lady, but trying to be hard and just.
 
What did you mean by the wording, " to be  a surprise, so don't let many people know about it because it might seize to be one when it finally arrives.
Thanks??? 
 
Does this mean the puppy is in any kind of danger??? 
 
I pray not, Allah will punish those that hurt animals.  Trust me.
 
Happy trails, Christina




So after laying the BS on a bit heavy, I have not heard from them again.......yet!
I've had a lot of fun and as you have said, that's what it's all about.  There has been a bit of talk on the dog forums about someone selling British Bulldogs from Alice Springs, of course they don't exist, so maybe I kept this guy busy for a week, chasing bigger game, and some puppy buyer has kept his money this week. 
Great site BTW.  Cheers



I only had to wait a day or so for it to all start up again.

Thanks for your messages.The problem is just that we are very solicitated all this while ,and didn't have enough  time to reply to your messages in Time.We do apologise for that.We are happy Mrs Louisa,is now out of danger.Please advise us on when possible she can be discharged from the hospital.
Extend are greetings to her,as we readily awaits her full recovery.As for the puppy,he is well taken care of by our vet doctor,so you got notting to worry about.He is of no danger.We just wanted him to be a surprise.Please also advise us on when it's possible for us to expect the payments,so that we could get everything ready before time,as well as get ready  your total billing.

messages.body:
Dear Thanks, Au Pet Courier and Frank Jeffs,
 
I am so glad you got my emails.  Finally.  I'm so sorry you have been over solicitated, nothing could be worsem I have been down that road meself.  Always, someone wants to over sollicatite me, and I get very angry.  I have some very bad newsm verry bad, very bad, Louisa has died.  I can hardly believe that her life has been taken over a freaking egg sanger!!!  I am again, inside meself, against meself, ontop of meself, and over the top and can't stop crying for my sister.  Wish I had a bloke to come and sort me out.  I do have a boyfriend, but he is not interested in helping out old ladies, he is a real 'little boy's man'.
 
I'm afraid the next couple of days will have to be spent with the task of burying me sister, bugga. I will have to get dynamite and that scares the hell out of me. Bugga!.  I hated her!! Well, I did use it once, but the amount of guts that flew thru the air-----was not pretty.  Anyway, it has to be done, since if we leave Louisa above ground, it will attract the Dingoes, and that is worse than dynamite, and you must have heard the storey about the dingo that took the baby??  Please let me know if you have heard this???
 
Once she is in the ground, or not, there is no reason, that you can't send me a new "invoice for payment"  MY new friends, could you possibly send a new invoice. stating a payment of $20,00.00??    We could divide the difference???
 
I know I'm an old drunk. but me spark has not been snuibed out yet  Do you want to share, and do yu want to?
 
With love, and wishingyou happy tails Christina




A quick follow up email from Christina, she still thinks the puppy is being imported.

messages.body:
Dear Au Pet Courier,
 
I'm to sad to continue, I will hand the whole thing over to my brother.  We did get some western union money order things and my brother Anthony Clay Diggs now has them.  I think he got 5 of them for $950 each because by the time he gets back to Alice Springs we will have insured more storage charges, it is ok, we could not help things. 
 
Your email is too slow getting to you from me, maybe because Clay also lives in Alice, his will get to your office quicker.  He will make arrangements to drop into your office and deliver them to you so they do not get any more delayed.  He left to fly home last night and he will contact you by his email as soon as he is up this morning.  He is very reliable man and will take the trailer at the time.
 
Thanks for all your patients, Christina




Here is a little note Frank Jeff, the so called owner of trailer, slipped to Gerty out of desperation.  He didn't even sign his name, wonder if he knows if he is Martha or Arthur?

I think he got 5 of them for $950 each because by the time he gets back to Alice Springs we will have insured more storage charges, it is ok, we could not help things.

Your email is too slow getting to you from me, maybe because Clay also lives in Alice, his will get to your office quicker. He will make arrangements to drop into your office and deliver them to you so they do not get any more delayed. He left to fly home last night and he will contact you by his email as soon as he is up this morning. He is very reliable man and will take the trailer at the time.

Thanks for all your patients, Christina
Here is a little note Frank Jeff, the so called owner of trailer, slipped to Gerty out of desperation. He didn't even sign his name, wonder if he knows if he is Martha or Arthur?

messages.body:
Dear Miss Gold,
 
I'm sorry you didn't rightly understand my last email.  I'm not the best shape since the dead of my sister. I wish much Scotch Whicky all the time.
 
I phoned my brother and I'm sorry he has been such a lazy arse and didn't contact you when he returned home as soon as he should have.  He was born after our family moved here, to our mother's second husband, Paul Diggs, and is a typical fair dunkum shazza chaser, never getting down to business, always chasing skirt.  He thinks he is some sort of down under Magnum P. O.  or something, but if you look at him, he is more like Max Clinger. 
 
He assures me he would email you straight after we got off the phone.  We did buy some money orders for you, he has them.  He is reliable man and will deliver them to your office.  He also has towing balls and will be able to take delivery of the trailer himself.  Also the puppy, how is the puppy?
 
Yours, on the happy trail to the bottle O, Christina

messages.body:
Dear Au Pet Courier,
 
You misunderstand.  Clay has the money orders in his hand, to hand over to you in Alice Springs when he meets you at 3 pm this Friday.  Your office can mail them if they want to, to anywhere in the world.  They have not been sent anywhere yet.  He will give them to your office and they can mail them, or he will maybe be able to mail them himself after he looks at the trailer.  He wishes to view the trailer first, before he hands over the money.  Clay is a police officer so he is very careful with his dealings.  He wants to make sure everything is in order.  He is very fair.  He is not wasting your time, maybe you have been wasting ours.  You refuse payment, except if we mail it to another country.  Do you actually want to sell this dog trailer???   We want to see the dog trailer first.  The money is there to hand over.  If you do not think this is fair then we will just have to deal with Mrs. Jeffs, because I'm sure he wants to sell his trailer and be finished with all this hassle.  This is all too much for a professional company such as yours.  Telephone lines down for over a week, how do you run a business lika this?  This is not how things are done in Alice Springs.  Why aren't you willing to take the safest form of payment known, cold hard cash?  Any dumbo in there rite mine would not pass up this.  You do business bassakwards.
 
Not happy Jan!
 
Trails, Christina
